description_top: Collection of philosophical and theological texts
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Collection of philosophical and theological texts
author: Thomas Aquinas (1225-1274)
description: Additional information: Mauro Zonta, Hebrew Scholasticism in the Fifteenth Century: A History and Source Book (Dordrecht: Springer, 2006), pp. 166-172.
provenance: John Fell (1625-1686), Dean of Christ Church and Bishop of Oxford.
catalogue_identifier: Neubauer 2453; Malachi Beit-Arié, Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library: Supplement of Addenda and Corrigenda to Vol. I (A. Neubauer’s Catalogue) (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1994), no. 2453; George William Kitchin, Catalogus codicum mss. qui in bibliotheca Ædis Christi apud Oxonienses adservantur (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1867), no. 187.
